name: Snake Eyes (PenguinWarlord)
description:
In Snake Eyes you play as a shopkeeper crafting special dice for a town of unlucky adventures. Face the odds as you (and your own enchanted dice!) roll on resources and forge dice of good luck. Each order needs the right stone and maybe a hint of magic but most importantly you HAVE to match the customer’s lucky number. Make as much money as you can before the shop closes for the day!

How to play

-Orders will appear on the top of the screen. Your goal is to match the colour, number and magic ( star ) of the dice.

-Drag your worker cards to the land cards on the map to gather resources

-Stack the resource cards to match the order values

-Some dice need magic ( star ) make sure to take those into account!

-Drag your stack over the forge to complete your dice

-Drag completed dice to the correct order

Music Credit:
